title: DFT study of Ti3C2 MXene nanosheets as a drug delivery system for 5-fluorouracil
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20300-20311
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02399D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Maryam Sadeghi, Bahram Khoshnevisan
In this study, we modeled a drug delivery system consisting of Ti3C2 MXene nanosheets as a carrier and 5-fluorouracil (FU) as a selected drug molecule using density functional theory (DFT) computations.
